title: The Authority shall issue notice to the owner of the buildings, artifacts, areas and precincts of historic and / or cultural significance etc
clause_text: The Authority shall issue notice to the owner of the buildings, artifacts, areas and precincts of historic and / or cultural significance etc. and invite objections and suggestions from such person in respect of proposed inclusion within 30 days from the date of such notice.
section: Preparation of List of Heritage Buildings, Heritage Precincts and Natural Features

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
